title: Technical Solutions Engineer Lead
content:
Solution Engineer Team Lead - Wise Platform
Compensation: $200,000 - $280,000 + RSUs + Benefits
We‚Äôre looking for a Solutions Engineer Team Lead to join our growing team in Austin. 
Wise is one of the fastest-growing companies in Europe and we‚Äôre on a mission: to make money without borders the new normal. We‚Äôve got 13 million customers across the globe and we‚Äôre growing. Fast.
Current banking systems don't let us send, spend or receive money across borders easily. Or quickly. Or cheaply. 
So, Wise is building a new one, and integrating it with partners globally.
And, we need a Solutions Engineering Lead to join our mission.
The team you‚Äôll be working with: Wise Platform ‚Äî Solutions Engineering
Solutions Engineering at Wise is a post sales role, focussed on working with our integrating partners to enable them to successfully launch a product based on Wise‚Äôs services. The role is multifaceted but includes providing technical consulting to partners, designing novel solutions to solve for their constraints and working internally to influence the product roadmap.
Wise is growing the Solutions Engineering function globally and are looking for a lead to continue building the team regionally and to support new and existing Wisers to achieve their potential. You would work across partners, your own team, Wise Platform and the wider organization to maximize your team‚Äôs impact.
Your role in the team:

You‚Äôll be responsible for the overall health and productivity of your team.
You‚Äôll provide feedback on your team‚Äôs approach and help them make data-driven decisions.
You‚Äôll have an overview of what‚Äôs happening across the organization and think about how this impacts partners, in terms of opportunities and risks.
When needed, you‚Äôll roll your sleeves up to be involved in the project delivery process.

Is that you?

Have previously worked with external parties to deliver technical projects with REST API integrations.
Experience building, leading and mentoring driven and a high performing technical delivery team.
Comfortable working on big challenges and a history of successfully delivering best in class solutions.
Experience building and designing scalable and performing systems within a microservice architecture
Expert on all things API, such as API design, Swagger, OpenAPI, OAuth2
Have a strong product mindset and be able to support others to make the right decisions and compromises.
Experience on managing client relationship and setting accurate expectations

‚Ä¶but don‚Äôt worry we don‚Äôt expect you to know everything!
Nice to have bonuses:

Have worked in the payment or fintech industries.
Experience working across multiple tech stacks and frameworks.
Experience working with large incumbent partners like banks.

What does success look like in this role? 

You‚Äôll have found your place in our mission by successfully supporting the team to deliver partner solutions.
You‚Äôll understand our partners and the impact our product makes to their business and their customers.
You‚Äôll make contributions to the wider engineering goals of the company.
You‚Äôll inspire a team environment where ideas are shared and openness is valued.
You‚Äôll help us scale-up and build a world class money transfer product that impacts millions of people and businesses

What you get back:

üöÄ RSU's in a rapidly growing company 
üí™ An annual self-development budget
ü©∫ Medical, dental, & vision insurance ‚Äì including HSA and FSA options
üíù Company-paid: Life Insurance, Short & Long-Term Disability, and an EAP program
üíª Hybrid working model ‚Äì a mix of working from home and from the office
‚úàÔ∏è  Wisers can work remotely for 90 days a year. By ‚Äòremote‚Äô we don‚Äôt just mean from home, but from wherever in the world you choose to
üåç Relocation expenses covered
‚òÄÔ∏è 25 days PTO, 15 sick days, 11 holidays, 5 compassionate leave days, 3 paid ‚ÄúMe‚Äù days and a paid volunteer day, annually
üèùÔ∏è A paid 6-week sabbatical leave after four years 
üë∂üèº 18-weeks of paid parental leave, after a year with us
üí∞ 401k with up to a 4% employer match 
üèÜ  2023 Austin BuiltIn Best Award winner for Best Places to Work and Best Large Places to Work

Find out more about our benefits in our Austin office (Same for NYC office).
Interested? Find out more:

How we work ‚Äì a practical guide
Wise Vlogs: Omar, Engineering Lead 
Engineering team blog
How our Engineers build new features

We‚Äôre people without borders ‚Äî without judgement or prejudice, too. We want to work with the best people, no matter their background. So if you‚Äôre passionate about learning new things and keen to join our mission, you‚Äôll fit right in.
Also, qualifications aren‚Äôt that important to us. If you‚Äôve got great experience, and you‚Äôre great at articulating your thinking, we‚Äôd like to hear from you.
And because we believe that diverse teams build better products, we‚Äôd especially love to hear from you if you‚Äôre from an under-represented demographic.
#LI-Hybrid#LI-RA1Salary (annual)$200,000‚Äî$280,000 USDWe're people without borders ‚Äî without judgement or prejudice, too. We believe teams are strongest when they are diverse, equitable and inclusive. We're proud to have a truly international team, and we celebrate our differences.
Every Wiser should feel that they can be themselves at work. Inclusive teams help us live our values and make sure every Wiser feels respected, empowered to share their contributions towards mission zero and able to progress in their careers.
Having diverse teams that reflect our diverse customer base helps us build a better product. We can be more creative and empathetic to our customer's needs and life experiences and makes sure we leave no-one behind on our journey to mission-zero.
If you want to find out more about what it's like to work at Wise visit Wise.Jobs.
Keep up to date with life at Wise by following us on LinkedIn and Instagram.

compliance.description: <p>PUBLIC BURDEN STATEMENT: According to the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995 no persons are required to respond to a collection of information unless such collection displays a valid OMB control number. This survey should take about 5 minutes to complete.</p>

questions.label: What's your desired gross salary, annually?
Are you currently based in the Austin area? If not, are you willing to relocate?
Do you now, or will you in the future, require sponsorship for a visa (or a visa transfer) to work legally for Wise in the United States?
At Wise we work based on a Hybrid model, a combination of work from home and from the office (on a weekly basis), does this work for you?
If you‚Äôre not currently based in a commutable distance to the location of this job, are you willing to relocate?

By answering yes, you confirm that all information provided in support of this application, including but not limited to my resume or curriculum vitae and the above information, is true and correct. I understand that false statements or material omissions of any kind during the hiring process may result in denial of employment or discharge.I understand and agree that if I am employed, I will be employed on an at-will basis. As an at-will employee, I understand and agree that either Wise or I can terminate our employment relationship, at any time for any reason, with or without advance notice and with or without cause.I understand that nothing contained in this employment application or interview process is intended to create an employment contract between Wise and me.
How many direct reports do you have?
